name: Data Engineer
description:
We are looking for Data Engineer to support our data platform development to ensure we have best in class instruments for analytics, data tracking and overall data infrastructure reliability.

What you will do:

  • Design and implement MLOps, Data Pipelines and Big Data supporting solutions;
  • Design, code, and maintain data solutions;
  • Collaborate with ML Engineers to research, develop, deploy and monitor Machine Learning models at large scale.

If this sounds like you, you probably have:

  • 2+ years experience in Software Engineering;
  • Strong programming skills in at least one programming language (preferred: Python);
  • Strong SQL skills;
  • Experience working on high scale production-grade projects;
  • Passion for writing clean, robust code and applying Software Engineering best practices;
  • Any experience with Big Data technologies / tools.

You May also have:

  • Experience with Data Analytic;
  • Systems administration skills in Linux;
  • Experience with MLOps / DevOps.

It’s Great if you have:

  • Good understanding of Hadoop ecosystems;
  • Experience working with Open-source products;
  • Experience ML lifecycle platforms (Kubeflow/MLflow);
  • Experience in Java.
